submissions.name: Media Watch on Climate Change
submissions.creator: ECOresearch Network / MODUL University Vienna
submissions.description: The Media Watch on Climate Change is a knowledge aggregator that aims to raise awareness and support new forms of communication and collaboration in the environmental domain. Based on the webLyzard Web intelligence platform (http://www.weblyzard.com), the Media Watch on Climate Change collects, annotates and visualizes documents from English, French and German online sources  including news and social media, Fortune 1000 Web sites and environmental NGOs.
